name: Message Popup For Contact Form 7
author: howdytheme

sections.description:
Message Popup For Contact Form 7 to make the best way to set up popup on success and failed messages. After submitting form Open Popup in contact form 7. it can be made a success and failed popup message in contact form 7.
Using this addon you can replace your validation and success messages into beautiful popup message to attract visitors. In wordpress admin there is all setting to popup to customize background color and font color.

FEATURES:

  • Easy to Use
  • Popup is fully responsive and Lightweight
  • Customize Success Popup content
  • Customize Popup width, border radius and border width with color
  • Customize Popup font color and button background color
  • Add Popup background overlay color
  • Customize Popup background color
  • Use different Success popups for different form
  • Compatible in all major browser

Documentation
Live Demo
Get Premium

FEATURES FOR PREMIUM:

  • Customize button text
  • Add autohide popup duration in milliseconds
sections.installation:
1. Make sure you have Contact Form 7 installed.
  2. Download the file to install and activate.
  3. Done! Just remember to keep the plugins up to date!
